info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 28 at 7:25PM CDT by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of east central De Kalb, central Kane, DuPage and northwestern Cook Counties through 800 PM CDT... At 724 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Maple Park to Lisle. Movement was east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Aurora, Naperville, Elgin, Schaumburg, Bolingbrook, Wheaton, Downers Grove, Elmhurst, DeKalb, Lombard, Bartlett, Streamwood, Carol Stream, Hanover Park, Addison, Glendale Heights, Elk Grove Village, St. Charles, Woodridge and Glen Ellyn. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
